info.title: BillingManagementClient
info.description: Billing client provides access to billing resources for Azure subscriptions.

get.description: Lists all billing accounts for a user which he has access to.

parameters.name: api-version
parameters.description: Version of the API to be used with the client request. The current version is 2019-10-01-preview.

parameters.name: $expand
parameters.description: May be used to expand the address, invoiceSections and billingProfiles.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

get.description: Get the billing account by id.

parameters.name: api-version
parameters.description: Version of the API to be used with the client request. The current version is 2019-10-01-preview.

parameters.name: $expand
parameters.description: May be used to expand the address, invoiceSections and billingProfiles.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

patch.description: The operation to update a billing account.

parameters.name: api-version
parameters.description: Version of the API to be used with the client request. The current version is 2019-10-01-preview.

requestBody.description: Request parameters supplied to the update billing account operation.

202.description: Accepted. Billing account update is in progress.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

parameters.name: api-version
parameters.description: Version of the API to be used with the client request. The current version is 2019-10-01-preview.

parameters.name: $expand

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

put.description: The operation to create a BillingProfile.

parameters.name: api-version
parameters.description: Version of the API to be used with the client request. The current version is 2019-10-01-preview.

requestBody.description: Request parameters supplied to the Create BillingProfile operation.

Retry-After.description: Recommends the retryable time after receiving this.

Location.description: Location URI to poll for result

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

patch.description: The operation to update a billing profile.

parameters.name: api-version
parameters.description: Version of the API to be used with the client request. The current version is 2019-10-01-preview.

requestBody.description: Request parameters supplied to the update billing profile operation.

202.description: Accepted. Billing profile update is in progress.

Retry-After.description: The amount of delay to use while the status of the operation is checked. The value is expressed in seconds.

Location.description: GET this URL to retrieve the status of the asynchronous operation.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

get.description: Lists customers by billing profile which the current user can work with on-behalf of a partner.

parameters.name: api-version
parameters.description: Version of the API to be used with the client request. The current version is 2019-10-01-preview.

parameters.name: $filter
parameters.description: May be used to filter the list of customers.

parameters.name: $skiptoken
parameters.description: Skiptoken is only used if a previous operation returned a partial result. If a previous response contains a nextLink element, the value of the nextLink element will include a skiptoken parameter that specifies a starting point to use for subsequent calls.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

post.description: Initiates the request to transfer the legacy subscriptions or RIs.

requestBody.description: Parameters supplied to initiate the transfer.

default.description: Unexpected error.

get.description: Lists products by invoice section name.

parameters.name: api-version
parameters.description: Version of the API to be used with the client request. The current version is 2019-10-01-preview.

parameters.name: $filter
parameters.description: May be used to filter by product type. The filter supports 'eq', 'lt', 'gt', 'le', 'ge', and 'and'. It does not currently support 'ne', 'or', or 'not'. Tag filter is a key value pair string where key and value is separated by a colon (:).

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

requestBody.description: Parameters supplied to the increase line of credit operation.

202.description: Accepted. Line of credit increase is in progress.

Retry-After.description: Recommends the retryable time after receiving this.

Location.description: Location URI to poll for result.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

get.description: Get billing property by subscription Id.
